alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; Franklin; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued February 17 at 2:31PM CST until February 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 20 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA CATAHOULA CONCORDIA FRANKLIN TENSAS IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 22 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ATTALA CHOCTAW COPIAH HINDS HOLMES LEAKE MADISON RANKIN SCOTT SIMPSON YAZOO IN NORTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CARROLL GRENADA MONTGOMERY WEBSTER IN SOUTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI LAWRENCE LINCOLN IN SOUTHWEST MISSISSIPPI ADAMS CLAIBORNE FRANKLIN JEFFERSON IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ACKERMAN, BRANDON, BROOKHAVEN, BUDE, CANTON, CARROLLTON, CARTHAGE, CRYSTAL SPRINGS, DURANT, EUPORA, FAYETTE, FERRIDAY, FOREST, GOODMAN, GRENADA, HARRISONBURG, HAZLEHURST, JACKSON, JONESVILLE, KOSCIUSKO, LEXINGTON, MADISON, MAGEE, MATHISTON, MEADVILLE, MENDENHALL, MONTICELLO, MORTON, NATCHEZ, NEW HEBRON, NEWELLTON, NORTH CARROLLTON, PEARL, PICKENS, PORT GIBSON, RICHLAND, RIDGELAND, ROXIE, ST. JOSEPH, TCHULA, VAIDEN, VICKSBURG, VIDALIA, WATERPROOF, WEIR, WESSON, WEST FERRIDAY, WINNSBORO, WINONA, AND YAZOO CITY.
